name: DeleteUserDefinedMessageSubscription
description: Delete a specific User Defined Message Subscription.

AccountSid.description: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that subscribed to the User Defined Messages.

CallSid.description: The SID of the [Call](https://www.twilio.com/docs/voice/api/call-resource) the User Defined Message Subscription is associated with. This refers to the Call SID that is producing the User Defined Messages.

Sid.description: The SID that uniquely identifies this User Defined Message Subscription.
